Artificial Intelligence Implementation Plan

This document outlines the Artificial Intelligence Implementation Plan for the United States Marine Corps, spanning Fiscal Years 2025-2030. Key Concepts:

  • Development of an Artificial Intelligence Implementation Plan for the United States Marine Corps.
  • Version control and iterative refinement of the plan through multiple AI Working Group feedback cycles.
  • Incorporation of feedback from various levels within the Department of the Navy (DON).
  • Misalignment of AI with mission objectives
  • Growing gaps in AI competency
  • Difficulty deploying AI at scale
  • Legacy governance frameworks
  • Timely intelligence and effective decisions
  • Upskilling of Marines for AI challenges
  • Digital ecosystem for AI integration
